resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Add a task to tasklist

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a task

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve a task

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve many tasks from a tasklist

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a task

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

task.name: task
task.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
task.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: completedMax
options.description: Upper bound for a task completion date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by

options.name: completedMin
options.description: Lower bound for a task completion date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by

options.name: dueMin
options.description: Lower bound for a task due date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by

options.name: dueMax
options.description: Upper bound for a task due date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by

options.name: showCompleted
options.description: Whether completed tasks are returned in the result. Show Hidden must also be True to show tasks completed in first party clients such as the web UI or Google's mobile apps.

options.name: showDeleted
options.description: Whether deleted tasks are returned in the result

options.name: showHidden
options.description: Whether hidden tasks are returned in the result

options.name: updatedMin
options.description: Lower bound for a task last modification time (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: completed
options.description: Completion date of the task (as a RFC 3339 timestamp). This field is omitted if the task has not been completed.

options.name: deleted
options.description: Whether the task has been deleted

options.name: dueDate
options.description: Due date of the task

options.name: notes
options.description: Additional Notes

options.name: previous
options.description: Previous sibling task identifier. If the task is created at the first position among its siblings, this parameter is omitted.

options.name: status
options.description: Current status of the task

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the task

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'task'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'task'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'task'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'task'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'task'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
